caption.p: Circulation of influenza B lineages according to season (year) and recommended vaccine lineage, Uruguay, 2012 to 2019. ( a) Circulation percentages of both lineages for each season based on samples that could be subtyped. Blue boxes represent B/Victoria lineage; grey boxes represent B/Yamagata lineage. ( b) Vaccine strains used for each year are indicated, and “Yes” or “No” if they coincide with the influenza B strains that have circulated. Abbreviations V1A, V1A1, Y2, and Y3 correspond to clade 1A of B/Victoria lineage, subclade 1 of B/Victoria clade 1 A lineage, clade 2 of B/Yamagata lineage, and clade 3 of B/Yamagata lineage, respectively.
